tit.e: TAIRA no Tomonobu Asonki (Diary of TAIRA no Tomonobu)

tit.cmt: 以下説明が続くので、英語説明を削除しました。

sen.j: 平知信朝臣記（たいらのとものぶあそんき）は、平安時代末期の官人平知信の日記。
sen.e: "TAIRA no Tomonobu Asonki" is a diary written by TAIRA no Tomonobu who was a government official in the end of the Heian period.

sen.e: It has been also known as "Tomonobu-ki" or "Tomonobu-asonki."

sen.j: 筆者は従四位上出羽国守平知信（桓武平氏平高棟流）。
sen.e: The author, TAIRA no Tomonobu, was Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade) governor of Dewa province, and his family was Kanmu heishi TAIRA no Takamune-ryu (Kanmu Taira clan TAIRA no Takamune line).

sen.j: 彼は藤原忠実・藤原忠通の家司を務めた実務官吏だった。
sen.e: He was a practical government official who served as Keishi (household superintendent) of FUJIWARA no Tadazane and FUJIWARA no Tadamichi.
